paper_abstract: It is shown that membership in rational subsets of wreath products H (sic) Vwith Ha finite group and V a virtually free group is decidable. On the other hand, it is shown that there exists a fixed finitely generated submonoid in the wreath product Z Zwith an undecidable membership problem. (C) 2014 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Rational subsets and submonoids of wreath products
